about_the_game:
Town of destruction is a fault finding game with the first perspective. Find the corresponding props through the photo album, put them in the designated position in the photo album, and restore the town as it is;



Recover the happiness and memory of the family by restoring the town;


A person who comes home meets his own town is broken. He needs you to help him find the key point of the broken town and restore the town to its original state.
  • WASD controls character movement
  • Shaking the mouse to rotate the angle of view
  • Use the left mouse button to obtain props within a certain range;
  • According to the photo album of key p, put the key props in the corresponding position to restore the town
  • Each time you restore an album scene, the role corresponding to the album will appear
detailed_description:
Town of destruction is a fault finding game with the first perspective. Find the corresponding props through the photo album, put them in the designated position in the photo album, and restore the town as it is;



Recover the happiness and memory of the family by restoring the town;


A person who comes home meets his own town is broken. He needs you to help him find the key point of the broken town and restore the town to its original state.
  • WASD controls character movement
  • Shaking the mouse to rotate the angle of view
  • Use the left mouse button to obtain props within a certain range;
  • According to the photo album of key p, put the key props in the corresponding position to restore the town
  • Each time you restore an album scene, the role corresponding to the album will appear
name: TownOfDestruction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: A person who comes home meets his own town is broken. He needs you to help him find the key point of the broken town and restore the town to its original state.
